text: NSI is a full-service recruitment and retention company. We contract only with clients that meet our high standards of excellence and take an executive approach to recruitment. With our red-carpet/white-glove treatment, you will enjoy a personal recruiter, industry leading recruitment incentives, immediate interview feedback, relocation assistance and a customized on-boarding process. All at no cost to you.

It's easy. If you choose to apply online, a Representative will contact you within 24 business hours to verify your basic information and discuss the opportunity. If you would like to contact us by telephone, NSI can be reached by calling toll free (866) BONUS 4U or (866) 266-8748. Our office hours are Monday-Friday, 8:00am-5:00pm, EST.
What if I am interested in interviewing at the hospital?

Your personal recruiter will walk you through each step of the process including: travel & hotel accommodations, directions, application process, documentation requirements, etc. During the hospital interview, you will meet the Nurse Manager or designee for your particular specialty. You will take a tour and learn more about the unit, the patient population, scheduling, shifts, staffing ratios, EMR, orientation, etc.
When should I expect to receive a decision from the Hospital?
In most cases, your personal recruiter will provide immediate feedback following the interview. During this time, pay, benefits, relocation, offer conditions, and start dates are also discussed.
Should you accept a position, you will become a core staff employee of our client, not an employee of NSI Nursing Solutions, inc.
If I do not see my ideal position, should I still apply now?
Yes. We will collect your information and create a profile of your interests. By doing this, we can fast-track you as soon as the opportunity becomes available.
